DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to show the accuracy and specificity of the Liat analyzer and assay for detecting Strep A at the point of care lab compared to culture.
DOC.brief_title: In Vitro Diagnostic Device for the Detection of Strep A
DOC.criteria: Subjects who are 3 years of age or older Subjects exhibiting symptoms characteristic of pharyngitis, possibly Streptococcus A, including: presence of sore throat, and at least one other symptom from the list below: redness of the posterior pharyngeal wall pharyngeal or tonsillar exudate tonsillar swelling tender cervical lymphadenopathy fever, >38C at presentation or within the past 24 hours Subjects who are able to understand and consent to participation; for minors under the age of 18, this includes parent or legal guardian Subjects treated with antibiotics currently or within the previous 7 days.
